cscie97.asn2.housemate.model

Class Appliance

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn2.housemate.model.Appliance

  • public class Appliance
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an Appliance in the House Mate Model.Appliances are House items but have the ability to determine the state and the controlling functionality of the Appliance as well.
    See Also:
    HouseMateAPI, House, Sensor
